episodes.name: The Real Animated Adventures of Doc and Mharti
episodes.overview:
Justin actually made this as a way to poke fun at the idea of getting cease and desist letters. 

At the time (October 2006) he had nothing to lose and his original intention was to call this "back to the future: the new official universal studios cartoon featuring the new Doc Brown and Marty McFly" and then just sit back and wait for a letter from their lawyers to arrive. That's actually why it's so filthy. He was just looking to "troll" a big studio.

7 years later, hit new animated TV show on adult swim.

episodes.name: Rick and Morty Presents Jerry's Game from Adult Swim Games
episodes.overview: From Adult Swim's Rick and Morty comes Jerry's Game, the pinnacle of mobile gaming! Step into the shoes of Morty's Dad, Jerry Smith, and invest your free time in our balloon-popping simulator for accomplished, respected individuals. Need encouragement for performing infant-level motor functions? Do you wish bubble wrap came with achievements? Jerry's Game has all of this and more! Download it and get poppin’!

We talk about their next 70 episodes and if Harry Potter's own Daniel Radcliffe is going to finally make his way to the tiny Rick and Morty screen. We hope he does, we really do.

episodes.name: Samurai & Shogun
episodes.overview: Drunken life, dreamy death.

episodes.name: Rick and Morty x Pringles - 2020 Big Game Commercial
episodes.overview: Stack Pringles. Make endless new flavors. Stack Pringles. Make endless new flavors. Stack Pringles. Make endless new flavors. This is not an ad.

episodes.name: Rick and Morty Vs. Genocider
episodes.overview: Directed by ‘Tower of God’ director, Takeshi Sano, Morty goes on an adventure to Tokyo, Japan to try and help stop “The Genocider”. Nothing weird happens. Produced by Sola Entertainment and animated at Telecom Animation Film.

episodes.name: Rick and Morty in the Eternal Nightmare Machine
episodes.overview: The simulation is corrupt, repair the core.

episodes.name: Summer Meets God (Rick Meets Evil)
episodes.overview: Summer's new boyfriend isn’t human, Jerry's in big trouble as usual, and Rick is well… just being Rick.

episodes.name: Exquisite Corpse
episodes.overview: Take a trip through the Rick and Morty multiverse.

episodes.name: The Great Yokai Battle of Akihabara
episodes.overview: Rick's toaster is broken. To repair it, he and Morty must go to Akihabara to find the perfect screw, and battle an old rival along the way.

episodes.name: Samurai and Shogun Part 2
episodes.overview: Paying homage to the classic tale Lone Wolf and Cub, Samurai Rick defends Shogun Morty against all comers. In part one, we learned that Rick WTM-72 is not to be underestimated. In the finale, his savagery knows no limit!

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: Rick moves in with his daughter's family and establishes himself as a bad influence on his grandson, Morty.

episodes.name: Lawnmower Dog
episodes.overview: Rick and Morty try to incept Morty's math teacher into giving Morty an 'A'.  Meanwhile, Rick gives Jerry a device to train their dog, Snuffles.

episodes.name: Anatomy Park
episodes.overview: Christmas day, Rick's friend, Reuben, comes over for his annual medical checkup.  Meanwhile Jerry learns his parents have a new friend.

episodes.name: M. Night Shaym-Aliens!
episodes.overview: Rick and Morty try to get to the bottom of a mystery in this M. Night Shyamalan style twistaroony of an episode!

episodes.name: Meeseeks and Destroy
episodes.overview: When Morty thinks Rick's adventures are too dangerous, he challenges Rick to let him lead one instead. Before heading out on Morty's quest, Rick caves to pleas from the rest of the Smith family to help them solve mundane tasks and leaves with them the Meeseeks Box, a gadget that will instantaneously summon helpers named Mr. Meeseeks.

episodes.name: Rick Potion #9
episodes.overview: Rick provides Morty with a love potion to get his dream girl, only for the serum to backfire and create a living Cronenberg nightmare.

episodes.name: Raising Gazorpazorp
episodes.overview: Morty convinces Rick to buy him a sexy robot.  Later Rick and Summer spend some quality time together.

episodes.name: Rixty Minutes
episodes.overview: Rick hacks the cable box, but the family are distracted by another one of his inventions.

episodes.name: Something Ricked This Way Comes
episodes.overview: Rick battles the devil and upsets Summer. Meanwhile, Jerry and Morty hang out.

episodes.name: Close Rick-Counters of the Rick Kind
episodes.overview: Rick and Morty have a falling out when Rick is approached by some familiar associates.

episodes.name: Ricksy Business
episodes.overview: Beth and Jerry go away on a trip, so Rick decides to throw a party.

episodes.name: A Rickle in Time
episodes.overview: Rick, Morty, and Summer get into trouble when time is fractured by a feedback loop of uncertainty that split reality into more than one equally possible impossibilities. Meanwhile, Beth and Jerry go to extreme lengths to save a deer struck by their vehicle.

episodes.name: Mortynight Run
episodes.overview: Rick teaches Morty to drive while leaving Jerry at a popular day care made just for him. Morty's conscience has him hunt down an assassin rather than spending the day at an alien arcade.

episodes.name: Auto Erotic Assimilation
episodes.overview: Rick gets emotionally invested when meeting an old friend, while Beth and Jerry have a falling out after making a discovery under the garage.

episodes.name: Total Rickall
episodes.overview: Trapped inside the house with an ever-increasing number of parasitic alien shape-shifters capable of altering memories, an uncertain Rick and the Smiths search for a way to determine which of them are real.

episodes.name: Get Schwifty
episodes.overview: When a massive head descends into Earth's atmosphere, Rick and Morty must save the planet by coming up with a new hit song. Meanwhile, Jerry, Beth, and Summer become part of a new religion.

episodes.name: The Ricks Must Be Crazy
episodes.overview: Rick and Morty travel inside the car's battery, where Morty discovers Rick has created a universe containing sentient life solely to produce power for him. Meanwhile, Summer must deal with being locked in the car with Rick's overzealous security system.

episodes.name: Big Trouble in Little Sanchez
episodes.overview: Rick undergoes a transformation to combat a local vampire situation. Meanwhile, Beth and Jerry attempt to sort out their relationship through marriage counseling.

episodes.name: Interdimensional Cable 2: Tempting Fate
episodes.overview: As Jerry decides between keeping his manhood or saving an alien leader from imminent death, the rest of the family take a look at what interdimensional television has to offer.

episodes.name: Look Who's Purging Now
episodes.overview: Rick and Morty find themselves on a planet where the sentient inhabitants practice a "purge for peace" way of life. Jerry and Summer work on their father-daughter relationship.

episodes.name: The Wedding Squanchers
episodes.overview: The whole family goes to the planet Squanch to attend the wedding of Rick's close friend, Bird Person.

episodes.name: The Rickshank Rickdemption
episodes.overview: The Smith family tries to cope without Rick, which is painful enough on its own without taking into consideration the stifling rules put into place by the Federation. Meanwhile Rick's past is finally revealed as he attempts to get out of his prison.

episodes.name: Rickmancing the Stone
episodes.overview: Rick, Morty and Summer travel to a post-apocalyptic dimension and meet some dangerous enemies, all the while avoiding a recent family development.

episodes.name: Pickle Rick
episodes.overview: Rick turns himself into a pickle, on the same day that Beth takes the kids to family therapy.

episodes.name: Vindicators 3: The Return of Worldender
episodes.overview: Rick and Morty reunite with a team of intergalactic heroes known as the Vindicators to defeat their arch enemy, Worldender.

episodes.name: The Whirly Dirly Conspiracy
episodes.overview: Rick and Jerry go on an adventure, while Beth fails as a mother and Summer has body issues.

episodes.name: Rest and Ricklaxation
episodes.overview: Rick and Morty need a break, so they head to a spa planet for some much needed rest and relaxation.

episodes.name: The Ricklantis Mixup
episodes.overview: Rick and Morty head to Atlantis. Meanwhile, the Citadel of Ricks is electing a new leader.

episodes.name: Morty's Mind Blowers
episodes.overview: Morty experiences some memories that he couldn't handle from past adventures.

episodes.name: The ABC's of Beth
episodes.overview: Jerry is lucky with a lady and Beth recalls her childhood.

episodes.name: The Rickchurian Mortydate
episodes.overview: It's Rick vs. POTUS in a fight to the finish!

episodes.name: Edge of Tomorty: Rick Die Rickpeat
episodes.overview: Rick brings Morty to a planet containing crystals that show whoever is touching them all the ways they may die depending on their choices.

episodes.name: The Old Man and the Seat
episodes.overview: Rick discovers that someone has been using his private "rest stop" and sets out to find them. Meanwhile, despite being warned not to, Jerry develops an app with Rick's alien intern, and chaos ensues.

episodes.name: One Crew Over the Crewcoo's Morty
episodes.overview: At the end of a treasure-hunting expedition, Rick discovers that the loot he and Morty sought had already been nabbed by the heist artist Miles Knightly. Furious at being upstaged, Rick recruits a crew required to gain entrance into Heist-Con as "professionals" so he can confront Miles.

episodes.name: Claw and Hoarder: Special Ricktim's Morty
episodes.overview: Rick promises Morty he can get a new companion: a flying, fire-breathing dragon. Jerry meets a mysterious talking cat.

episodes.name: Rattlestar Ricklactica
episodes.overview: During one of their adventures in outer space, Rick and Morty's ship suffers a flat tire. While they carry out repairs, Morty suffers a potentially lethal snake bite that leads to a complicated, time-travelling encounter with a snake civilization.

episodes.name: Never Ricking Morty
episodes.overview: An anthology episode that follows Rick and Morty on a train with people who don't like Rick. They have to find their way out but they bump into unexpected situations along the way.

episodes.name: Promortyus
episodes.overview: Rick and Morty find themselves in a fight against face-hugging aliens who just happen to have an M&Ms store.

episodes.name: The Vat of Acid Episode
episodes.overview: It's a Rick, Morty and a vat of acid kind of adventure. But will it be worth Morty missing his English class for?

episodes.name: Childrick of Mort
episodes.overview: Rick, Morty, Beth, Summer and Jerry share a galactic adventure.

episodes.name: Star Mort: Rickturn of the Jerri
episodes.overview: An adventure with an invisibility belt, but a family that disappears together, must stay together.

episodes.name: Mort Dinner Rick Andre
episodes.overview: Big man comin for dinner, broh. Better check the booze.

episodes.name: Mortyplicity
episodes.overview: The Smiths suspect they're being hunted. But who's even real?

episodes.name: A Rickconvenient Mort
episodes.overview: Morty falls in love with an environmental superhero, while Rick and Summer go on an apocalypse bar crawl.

episodes.name: Rickdependence Spray
episodes.overview: A failed Rick experiment creates monsters that threaten the country.

episodes.name: Amortycan Grickfitti
episodes.overview: Summer and Morty steal Rick's car to impress a new kid at school. Rick and Jerry have a guys' night from hell.

episodes.name: Rick & Morty's Thanksploitation Spectacular
episodes.overview: In this Thanksgiving episode, Rick and Morty need to get a presidential pardon.

episodes.name: Gotron Jerrysis Rickvangelion
episodes.overview: Summer enables Rick's addiction to collecting giant combining robots, and the family becomes The Family.

episodes.name: Rickternal Friendshine of the Spotless Mort
episodes.overview: Rick attempts to save a beloved friend.

episodes.name: Forgetting Sarick Mortshall
episodes.overview: Rick gets new sidekicks, while Morty makes a new friend.

episodes.name: Rickmurai Jack
episodes.overview: Rick is living his best anime life, making new friends and taking down new enemies.
